verbs.description: Why [V: would] the Trump administration be willing to start a trade war with the United States’ most important trading partners – as well as some of its oldest allies ?

[ARGM-CAU: Why] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [V: be] [ARG2: willing to start a trade war with the United States’ most important trading partners – as well as some of its oldest allies] ?
Why would [ARG0: the Trump administration] be willing to [V: start] [ARG1: a trade war with the United States’ most important trading partners – as well as some of its oldest allies] ?
